title: Getting insights into chemical composition and antiherpetic capability of jujube (Ziziphus jujuba mill.) drupes
content:
Publication date: 15 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 17

Author(s): Annalisa Chianese, Hamid Mushtaq, Bianca Maria Nastri, Maria Vittoria Morone, Rosa Giugliano, Humaira Khan, Simona Piccolella, Carla Zannella, Severina Pacifico, Massimiliano Galdiero, Anna De Filippis
